name: 2Twin Beds close to MBTA, short distance to Fenway
description:
2 Beds twin beds in the heart of Roxbury

The space
Single family house located across the street from Roxbury Community College and the Reggie Lewis Athletic center. 75 yards from Roxbury Crossing MBTA Station and 5 minute walk to Northeastern University. 10 minute subway ride to Downtown Boston The Room itself includes: Roku TV (Free Netflix), AC, Portable Space Heater, Computer desk and chair.

Guest access
Guest's have access to a full kitchen, two bathrooms and a very comfortable living room area. Kitchen also includes coffee maker, toaster, and a microwave.

Other things to note
Street Parking: Street cleaning on Tuesdays between 8 AM-12 Noon from April to November


**IMPORTANT NOTICE**

I can NOT accommodate early arrivals or dropping off of luggage ahead of the 3pm check in time under any circumstance.

License number
STR-383502
